verbose_text: ABA treatment can activate several MAPK isoforms with molecular masses of ~ 40 kD from different plants, such as p45MAPK (Pisum sativum) XREF_BIBR, p38MAPK (Funaria hygrometrica) XREF_BIBR, AtMPK3, p46MAPK, AtMPK6 and AtMPK4 (Arabidopsis thaliana) XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, OsMAPK5 (Oryza sativa) XREF_BIBR, and p46MAPK (Zea mays) XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: ABA treatment can activate several MAPK
